beast_egg.name: Beast Egg
beast_egg.desc: A speckled egg found in the wild. Hatches into a random beast companion.

dragon_egg.name: Dragon Egg
dragon_egg.desc: A crimson egg radiating heat. Only the bravest dare carry one.

shadow_egg.name: Shadow Egg
shadow_egg.desc: Completely black, it seems to absorb light around it.

celestial_egg.name: Celestial Egg
celestial_egg.desc: Glows with pure divine light. Hard to look at directly.

mystery_egg.name: Mystery Egg
mystery_egg.desc: No one knows what's inside. Something ancient stirs within...
